articles.description: All the latest football news and reaction to the FA Cup as Crystal Palace beat Doncaster to reach the fifth round plus Liverpool and Everton news conferences to come.
articles.title: Palace through to fifth round & Plymouth to face Man City - FA Cup reaction and draw

articles.description: Warren Gatland is set to leave his role as Wales head coach after 14 successive Test match defeats.
articles.title: Warren Gatland: Wales rugby union head coach to leave role

articles.description: Guillem Balague examines the problems that have led Manchester City and Real Madrid to meet in the Champions League play-off.
articles.title: Champions League: Man City & Real Madrid fighting for their lives

articles.description: Jordan Mailata worked in construction while trying to become a rugby league player in Australia but has now completed his unique journey to Super Bowl winner.
articles.title: Super Bowl 2025: Philadelphia Eagles' Jordan Mailata completes 'greatest story in football'

articles.description: The Afghanistan Women's XI played their first match after an evacuation likened to "a Jason Bourne movie", led by three women on the other side of the world.
articles.title: Afghanistan women's cricket: The refugee team who will not be silenced

articles.description: New Zealand Rugby launches legal action against former sponsor Ineos for alleged breach of contract.
articles.title: Ineos: New Zealand Rugby takes legal action after sponsor pull-out

articles.description: The two-legged Champions League knockout phase play-offs get under way this week with Manchester City and Celtic among the 16 teams looking to reach the last 16.
articles.title: Champions League play-offs: who faces who?

articles.description: Tiger Woods withdraws from this week's Genesis Invitational at Torrey Pines as he is "still processing" the death of his mother.
articles.title: Tiger Woods withdraws from Genesis Invitational as he 'still processing' death of his mother

articles.description: Espanyol accuse Barcelona and Spain defender Mapi Leon of "violating the privacy" of their player Daniela Caracas following an incident in a Liga F game on Sunday.
articles.title: Mapi Leon: Barcelona defender accused of violating privacy of Espanyol's Daniela Caracas

articles.description: Luka Doncic calls his Los Angeles Lakers debut a "special moment" after he helps his new franchise beat the visiting Utah Jazz 132-113.
articles.title: NBA: Luka Doncic calls LA Lakers debut 'a special moment'
